author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-‍Constellation Pharmaceuticals Inc Says It Has Raised $99 Mln In Equity Financing
text:
April 6 (Reuters) - ‍Constellation Pharmaceuticals Inc :
* ‍Constellation Pharmaceuticals Inc Files To Say It Has Raised $99 Mln In Equity Financing - SEC FILING​
* ‍CONSTELLATION PHARMACEUTICALS INC DISCLOSES IN FORM D WITH U.S. SEC THAT THE TOTAL OFFERING AMOUNT WAS FOR $100 MILLION Source text for - bit.ly/2H1ndj2
